properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
They crucified my saviour
and nailed him to a cross. x3
And the Lord shall bear
His children home. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He rose, He rose,
He rose from
the dead; x3
And the Lord shall bear
His children home. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Joseph took his body
down and laid it
in the tomb. x3
And the Lord shall bear
His children home. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
An angel came from
heaven and raised
him from the tomb x3.
And the Lord shall bear
His children home. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sister Mary
came running
I'm looking for my Lord. x3
And the Lord shall bear
His children home. x2
